ing: 1 pound fresh asparagus, trimmed and coarsely chopped
des: "A very quick and easy pasta dish inspired by my Italian grandmother.  Sort of an Italian stir-fry.  Serve this over short pastas such as shells, orrechietti, or farfalle."
ins: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat.  Saute shrimp, asparagus and garlic until asparagus is bright green and slightly tender.  Stir in hot sauce and salt.  Dust with Romano cheese before serving.
